extendedInfo.description: Doctor Who TARDIS LWP: Now comes with two live wallpapers.-Touch controlled TARDIS-Eleventh Doctor opening sequenceNOTE: This will not appear under your applications, but will rather appear as two wallpaper services when you go to Menu -> Wallpaper -> Live Wallpapers.I realize the image quality is less than desirable but please understand that it's a trade-off between frame rate & resolution and battery drain. I've received comments about the performance and chose to sacrifice smoothness and compress the images to more wisely use system resources. Please have realistic expectations.NOTE: if the wallpaper appears blank, touch the screen.If you find any bugs or have any suggestions, feel free to email me at didacticdev@gmail.comKNOWN ISSUES:-None! "My ship don't crash. She crashes, you crashed her."

reviews.title: looks really cool....BUT
reviews.comment: I would love to have it but the \'open\' button isn\'t there and it doesn\'t appear on my application menu either. I was excited to get this because I love Doctor Who. Please fix this and I think I will rate this 6/5!!
reviews.author: Fred B

reviews.title: Galaxy S3
reviews.comment: Awesome live wallpaper. First one is the best.  Thanks!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: LOVE IT!
reviews.comment: The ONLY thing I want is to place the Tardis, on the fixed option.  Other than that, good, not the best resolution, but worth the price. I hope they add more.
reviews.author: Lemmy Hernandez

reviews.title: Mmm not good on tablets
reviews.comment: very low resolution, one of the lwp\'s is just a series of low res screen grabs, they even have the BBC logo in the corner. This has potential but compared to the Galaxy series of lwp\'s this is very primative. Purchased then refunded.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I can\'t actually open the app. There\'s no way for me to set it as my background :( please fix and I will rate better\tI can\'t actually open the app. There\'s no way for me to set it as my background :( please fix and I will rate better
reviews.author: Megan H

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Barely drains the battery and looks really cool. I could sit here and watch it for hours.
reviews.author: Jack Frost

reviews.title: meh
reviews.comment: low quality and honestly not that great. time vortex is cool, but goes way to fast to really enjoy it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Cool
reviews.comment: Great live wallpaper thanks so much, only wish you would add a few more to it :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great, but funny things going on??
reviews.comment: Love this, but starting march 10th, my phone was acting up. It said sd card is damaged first. Then it started rebooting at random. After the third, the wallpaper reverted back to the factory default, I tried to change it back, but it wasn\'t there! I went into safe mode and uninstalled the app, then reinstalled it, BUT it turns out there was an update on march 9th that I never got! After I reinstalled, everything was back to normal except for the damaged sd card, but it i backed it up, + restored it. Contact
reviews.author: Jonathan Stein

reviews.title: Adorable!
reviews.comment: I am using the option where I can move the TARDIS around, it seems like it will probably use less battery power. I love that it fades in and out. My ONLY complaint, or suggestion, would be that for that version of the background there might be different starry sky scenes to choose from, or that the stars might twinkle?  I wish there were more WORKING DW themed apps out there, like for SMS. You seem to know what you\'re doing, maybe you should give it a go? :O
reviews.author: Brittany Bonare

reviews.title: Bit choppy at times, low res...
reviews.comment: WHO CARES?  xD Those are my only problems with this. This is the only TARDIS LWP that actually has a TARDIS spinning in the Time Vortex! My only wish is a bit more vibrancy, it can be quite dark.
reviews.author: delaney frazier

reviews.title: Tardis
reviews.comment: I would love to keep this app but when i try to open my facebook app while the tardis is falling through the vortex, my screen gos black and facebook wont open. Sorry i have to uninstall. Ofherwise really cool. Add sound would be even cooler......... Im reinstaIling . I think the problem was facebook not this app
reviews.author: Alan Coker

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Working well on my galaxy ace never breaks down does what it says its the tardis in a time vortex Excellent
reviews.author: andrea walton

reviews.title: A bit lacking..
reviews.comment: I only bought it cause I really like DW but this was the only live wallpaper available for the Dr. I expected to have an option/s for sound/s, as well as a higher rez for the background image. All of which could easily be added thru the wallpaper options screen.   Please consider the tablet users out there, like myself.. B-)   Kudos for the effort, although I don\'t think this is worth the $ as it is currently. 3 things; Sounds option, High rez/tablet background image, & option to have Tardis randomly float.
reviews.author: Auhsoj Nayr Oktrab

reviews.title: Really really like it!
reviews.comment: Its not perfect but it\'s 99\302\242 so get over it and it states the quality isnt great so you know before purchase. I\'m happy :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: I tried it on my tablet and it looks like crap. Also, the vortex wallpaper is sideways and when I turned my device the \"right way up\" the wallpaper turned aswell. I want my money back!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wibbly wobbly timey wimey
reviews.comment: Great wallpaper for any true whovian. I also have the tardis taking of as my ringtone so when my phone rings it\'s like the Doctor is popping in LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s alright
reviews.comment: The vortex wallpaper Is awful and the other one is Okay. Not worth a dollar
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Room for improving
reviews.comment: The vortex is juttery, the tenth vortex could work better just when it\'s coming towards you. The tardis needs just two more sizes or the tardis being a wiget or editable wallpaper behind it.
reviews.author: Kris Fielding

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: It\'s really good. Tighten up the resolution on the vortex and it would be even better.
reviews.author: A Google User
